item.description:
March of Dimes protests - Connecticut - April 30 & May 1

We will place informative flyers on the cars and pass out leaflets & display posters for walk participants to view (if possible).

Please help - WE NEED YOUR PARTICIPATION!

Informing the walk participants about the UGLY TRUTH that the March of Dimes hides can help tremendously - getting the word out to their financial supporters is a great way to make a difference in helping end the needless suffering of animals in their labs.

RSVP here 
https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=213786615302730


or via email -  true.vegan@gmail.com


Please be sure to include which day(s) & location(s) you can
cover & your contact info (email & Cell # if possible so we can find each other on event day)  thank you!!

---------- Saturday, April 30 ~

Walnut Hill Park
199 Lexington Street
New Britain, CT 06051

---------- Sunday, May 1 ~

Rentschler Field
615 Silver Lane
East Hartford, CT 06118

Vinal Regional Tech School
60 Daniels St
Middletown, CT 06457

Lighthouse Point Park
2 Lighthouse Point Road
New Haven, CT 06515

Registration for all events starts at 9 a.m. and the walks start at 10 a.m.

We will meet at 8:30 am.

Materials will be provided.


--- FACTS about the March of Dimes cruel & unecessary
experiments

http://www.pcrm.org/resch/charities/mod/
